title:
Any chance we could convince the county to allow some natural or man made structure to be sunk in the lake at Smith Creek Park? 



This lake has huge potential to become an outstanding fishery with a little help. No motorized boats, catch and release, and some structure would allow for some great family fishing!



Sunken trees make great natural structure, while man made \reef balls\" can attract fish as well. Im sure with all the marine biologists at UNCW there is someone that could support my idea with some research!"
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=13535
